name: Escobar - Original Maduro - Distinguidos Romeo
additionalNotes: Escobar Cigars was born from the dream of a close group of lifelong friends who sought to discover the exceptional and share it with the world. Each Escobar Cigar is the result of a passion for detail and offers a smooth and satisfying experience that invites you to connect with others on a deeper level. His brand strives to foster a brighter and more welcoming world, both through its products and its philanthropic efforts.
